name: networkmanager
deps: dbus_glib, libndp, libnl, nss, consolekit2, curl, dhcp, gobject_introspection, iptables, polkit, pygobject3, upower, vala, wpa_supplicant, bluez, qt5_base, modemmanager
desc:
NetworkManager is a set of co-operative tools that make networking
simple and straightforward. Whether WiFi, wired, 3G, or Bluetooth, 
NetworkManager allows you to quickly move from one network to another: 
Once a network has been configured and joined once, it can be detected 
and re-joined automatically the next time it
